ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: So why should you object if there is a pvp slanted song in our arsenal?  so there s a song in there that you don t personally use.  you aren t inconvenienced
ygData.messageBody:
So why should you object if there is a pvp slanted song in our arsenal? so
there's a song in there that you don't personally use. you aren't inconvenienced
by this song being in existence.

At 02:23 PM 2/26/01 -0700, you wrote:
>Right so those other 19 people will not be inconvenienced then by any bard
>change apparently. So they also shouldn't object to bard issues being
>fixed. Cause if you start to actually say "Should we spend time on fixing
>bard issues?" you're right back at having those 14 segments again because
>every one of them will want "their" issues fixed.
